mcq.statement: Choose one of the correct sentence: You can eat all you want in a cruise ship., Don't stand on the canoe! It's going to tip over!,I saw Ahsan and Samra on a carriage around Central Park.

options.a: You can eat all you want in a cruise ship.
options.b: Don't stand on the canoe! It's going to tip over!
options.c: I saw Ahsan and Samra on a carriage around Central Park.
options.d: Asad and Farah were on the bus for over 45 minutes.
